GSD.description:
drm: Prevent drm_copy_field() to attempt copying a NULL pointer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit d213914386a0ede76a4549b41de30192fb92c595. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm: Prevent drm_copy_field() to attempt copying a NULL pointer
